replies.body: Thank you for replying . My firewalls is not working he is disabled .. and i disabled my antivirus too .

Do me a favor and double check your firewalls and antivirus to make sure nothing is blocking your network from being able to communicate with our servers. This [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) has a lot of helpful troubleshooting steps as well, so be sure to go through the steps there as well.

Have you tried going into your task-manager and close all League processes then relaunch the client?
Have you checked your fire-wall or anti-virus to make sure the League of Legends is an allowed application? It sounds like something is trying to prevent the connection to the game.
